item.title: Darrell add a quote by Neal Stephenson
item.description: "Our opponent is an alien starship packed with atomic bombs," I said. "We have a protractor." -- Neal Stephenson

item.title: Darrell add a quote by Neal Stephenson
item.description: "Ninety-nine percent of everything that goes on in most Christian churches has nothing whatsoever to do with the actual religion. Intelligent people all notice this sooner or later, and they conclude that the entire one hundred percent is bullshit, which is why atheism is connected with being intelligent in people's minds." -- Neal Stephenson

item.title: Darrell add a quote by Neal Stephenson
item.description: "When you are wrestling for possession of a sword, the man with the handle always wins." -- Neal Stephenson

item.title: Darrell add a quote by Neal Stephenson
item.description: "..this is just like life must be for about 99 percent of the people in the world. You're in this place. There's other people all around you, but they don't understand you and you don't understand them, but people do a lot of pointless babbling anyway. In order to stay alive, you have to spend all day every day doing stupid meaningless work. And the only way to get out of it is to quit, cut loose, take a flyer, and go off into the wicked world, where you will be swallowed up and never heard from again." -- Neal Stephenson

item.title: Darrell add a quote by Neal Stephenson
item.description: "Gold is the corpse of value..." -- Neal Stephenson

item.title: Darrell add a quote by Neal Stephenson
item.description: "The hour of noon has passed,' said Judge Fang. 'Let us go and get some Kentucky Fried Chicken." -- Neal Stephenson

item.title: Darrell add a quote by Neal Stephenson
item.description: "To condense fact from the vapor of nuance." -- Neal Stephenson
